entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ReJITID is always zero in ILToNativeMapDCStart event #70187
  • [API Proposal]: Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #70184
  • Improve handling of reused constants in the register allocator #70182
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Memory.Tests`/AOT/windows/v8 #70175
  • Creating a tar directly into a GZipStream crashes when writing final records #70172
    7.0.0
  • Proposal: Make Console.Input/OutputEncoding default to UTF-16 on Windows #70168
  • System.IO.Tests.directory_move_multiple_from_watched_to_unwatched_mac test failing #70164
  • libhostfxr.dylib fails after installing another version of .net #70163
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/28/2022 1:41:21 AM #70162
  • ConsoleLogger output is garbled with color codes when redirected #70156
  • - #70155
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader)' during 'Generate code' #70152
  • ConfigurationBinder.Bind on virtual array property duplicates elements #70150
  • Unnecessary comparisons not eliminated for full range checks #70145
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in IndexOf #70158
  • [Perf] Regressions from flow graph reordering change #70159
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_BoostDocs_Simple #70160
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #70161
  • [ServiceProvider] Services registered as open generic are overwritten by closed generic registrations when ValidateOnBuild is on #70140
  • [API Proposal]: IDistributedCache overloads with ReadOnlyMemory<byte> support #70137
  • Loading a .NET host in a C++ program seems to change exception handling behavior #70136
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in Default Interface Method #70135
  • build-native.sh doesn't update the shared testhost #70134
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #70133
    7.0.0
  • Comments on 'System.Convert' are obsolete #70131
  • SerialPort: continuously `TimeoutException` when write bytes first time failed. #70130
  • JsonNode serialize should respect naming policy #70129
  • CryptographicException in System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.Tests.PEBuilderTests.Checksum test #70128
  • Ctor_InvalidNames_Unix is failing on NativeAOT on Linux #70127
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Linux dwarf info is severely malformed #70125
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix3x2Tests.Matrix3x2CreateRotationCenterTest #70124
  • CreateSymbolicLink is either buggy or unnecessarily expensive #70123
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Improve the UX for using codespaces to run library tests, and debug #70122

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] GC suspension issues with System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #70115
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo failing in CI #68291
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vector3 causes a segfault #63354
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate.RawSerialNumberMemory #70177
  • Some System.Data abstraction types don't properly implement disposable pattern #70049
  • JIT: checked/release diffs #70143
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Version #66995
    7.0.0
  • ModuleBuilder.GetType does not work with ignore case with certain unicode chars on Unix #18231
    7.0.0
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Unit.Tests.HostAbortedExceptionTests` doesn't work on OSX #70132
  • Code example in DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md is outdated #49082
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionContext_NotCachedInSocketAsyncEventArgs - failure in Assert.True #1722
    7.0.0
  • Blazor MAUI Android SSL Certification failed for self-signed server #63064
    6.0.x
  • [Native AOT] LINK : fatal error LNK1102: out of memory and Failed to load type #70092
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors failure #70121
  • Many jobs are failing with a 401 response #69854
  • native-managed HResult incompatibility #70099
  • Test failure LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #69977
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: new System.ComponentModel.DateOnlyConverter and System.ComponentModel.TimeOnlyConverter classes #68743
    7.0.0
  • .Netcore 3.1 Error using PasswordDeriveBytes.CryptDeriveKey #66460
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    area-System.Security
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mop-up changes per Jakob's PR suggestions #70180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Do not read position when tar archive stream is unseekable #70178
    area-System.IO
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-Meta
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging wbt failures on windows #70174
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Ensure that GT_CNS_VEC is handled in LinearScan::isMatchingConstant #70171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forbid creating layout-less `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #70170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle enums in box-unbox optimization #70167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update analyzer version and fix new findings #70157
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Properly handle trailing whitespace in the URL for the HttpClient #70154
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove unused winapi mimicking headers under PAL #70153
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70149
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove some dead code / branches #70146
    area-Meta
  • Safe size estimation for SymbolicRegexNode #70139
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: fix invariant analysis for cloning #70126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AVX2 SIMD code paths for ASCIIUtility #70120
    community-contribution

Merged

  • fix InstanceDataCollectionCollection_CopyTo by retrying on 0 values #70119
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Remove thumbprint allocation in ManagedCertificateFinder #70173
    area-System.Security
  • Delete an old quirk from `gtSetEvalOrder` #69894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix crash on osx-arm64 with Vector3 #70141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Update updating-ref-source.md #70169
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Exempt MemberNotNullWhen from genapi ref assembly requirements #70113
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tag myself on area-CodeGen-coreclr issues #70142
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Fix checked/release diff #70144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable test that already fixed #70065
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Skip HostAbortedExceptionTests when BinaryFormatter isn't supported #70151
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable flaky DNS cancellation tests during jitstress #70089
    area-System.Net
  • Move TypeReference.ToObject to managed (CoreCLR) #70055
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use key properties to determine ECC key size for Apple #70116
    area-System.Security
  • Improve DisplayNameHelpers for NativeAOT #70084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #70034
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update Roslyn to pick up recent features / bug fixes / design changes #70087
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update test to stop expecting removed diagnostics #70106
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Fix VTableCallHolder writeable mapping size with W^X #70103
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Support more primitive type converters #70057
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Feature/add event to minmax threads config #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes for `GT_RETURN` nodes, then hoisting them to statements #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add {M}IBC to glossary #68111
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File
  • [Mono] Add retry mechanism to test execution process #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • Move Format property to TarEntry and allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries #69933
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not use `LEA`s in HIR #69992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not rely on `GT_ADDR` in `gtFoldBoxNullable` #69961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Enable -Werror=shorten-64-to-32 #70062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Host error message updates #70059
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.7
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70041
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Add leg to build wasm with threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Add exception interop test for validating native exception interop on Windows + CoreCLR. #70110
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning appears about not specifying self-contained when PublishTrimmed or PublishAot are set #25808
    7.0.1xx
  • Make `Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk` an implicit reference #25797
  • Prevent `dotnet publish` from marking dll files as executable on linux #25778
  • The dotnet publish command using dll timestamp instead of specified version when coping #25776

Closed

  • Add an `-lp` option alias to `dotnet run` for `--launch-profile` #25770
  • AnalysisLevel preview setting is missing tests #25450
    7.0.1xx
  • With .NET SDK 6.0.300-preview.22154.4, warning NETSDK1179 still shows when running "dotnet publish -r win-x64 --self-contained" in CLI #24269
    6.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the RID target from lower macOS to the latest one #25784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test for installing nuget packages ensuring no breaking changes in Nuget #25783
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25781
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add fallback root certificate bundle for code signing and timestamping #25687
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add -lp alias for --launch-profile on dotnet run #25798
    Area-CLI
  • Compatibility tooling refactoring #25765
  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • [main] Integrate dotnet user-jwts tools into SDK #25757
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.1xx-preview5] Integrate new user-jwts tool into SDK #25771
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CodeAction telemetry lacks mechanism to provide sub-categories or other relevant pieces of information #61665
  • Require spaces within the enhanced `#line` directive #61663
  • CSharpCodeFixTest test code with Record keyword, give CS0518 error #61655
  • ExtractMethodRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61652
    Backlog
  • API proposal: represent `ref` fields and `scoped` parameters and locals #61647

Closed

  • "Extract base class" shouldn't be the first item in the light bulb #61334
    Backlog
  • ReassignedVariable classifier crashed #61503
  • [Feature Request][Interpolated Strings] Add option to automatic add a $ when write a " #61556
  • Can't add semi-colon to end of line #61638
  • [LSP] Simplify semantic tokens token types legend #61237
  • compile error when using function pointer in Expression<> #59454
    17.3
  • Multiple matches for the interface member warning is not reported static members #61553
    C# 11.0
  • Adjust `ITypeSymbol.IsSignedIntegralType` and related APIs for numeric IntPtr #61350
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch backing store for callback-array to an immutable structure so it cannot change as we are enumerating over it. #61671
    Area-IDE
  • Prefer stack storage for highly-contended temporary array #61670
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • Allow SyntaxOffset in EnC state machine map to be negative #61667
    Area-Interactive
  • Do not use `SourceText` indexer when parsing #61662
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert two changes #61660
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed incorrect discard suggestion in var pattern #61657
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Tweak UTF-8 string literal analyzer and code fix after language change #61650
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the AssemblyMetadata produced for any given compilation #61649
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Move crash to NFW in assignment-underlining #61664
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Deprioritize 'extract base class' when on a member in a type #61666
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove documents as a batch instead of individually #61656
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61668
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Utilize list of all classification types + expose types to Razor #61395
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - Fix bug where trigger character and start of snippet intersect #61633
    Area-IDE
  • Mention sharplab in bug template #61637
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Emit error when function pointer invocation is encountered in an expression tree #61644
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Function Pointers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61651
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report a warning for multiple matches for implicit interface implementation of static member #61607
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Update compiler to supported UnmanagedMemoryStream when creating ModuleMetadata. #61630
    Area-IDE
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Fixed collection and object initializer usage analysis not working in top-level code #61584
    Area-IDE
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Dev Box integration with dotnet/aspnetcore #42004
  • Provide a more intelligent routing fallback for Blazor apps that only falls back if the route matches a routable component #42003
  • Adding a new Enhanced Connect :protocol pseudo-header #42002
  • SignalR Client ServerSentEvents does not support `\n` delimited Messages #42001
  • Support multiple issuers in JwtBearerConfigureOptions #42000
  • [Blazor WASM] UserOptions not bound when published #41998
    6.0.x
  • Hub methods can soft-lock the connection #41997
    .NET 7 Planning
  • w/return results blocks client receive pipeline #41996
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Replace Single(connectionId) with Client(connectionId) and Caller #41994

Closed

  • Make Web API Analyzers part of the default template #41889
  • 403 (ModSecurity Action) for a blazor server-side web app #34537
    7.0-preview6
  • SignalR: Content-Type header in GET requests #41378
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #41980
  • QUESTION: Error: Connection disconnected with error 'Error: WebSocket closed with status code: 1005 (no reason given).' #41947
  • NullReferenceException in .NET MAUI Blazor when calling secured API through HttpClient after authentication #41951
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #41964
  • Regression in AddDataProtection from RC2 #38274
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HTTP Error 503.0 - Server has been shutdown The service is unavailable. Most likely causes: An invalid identity in the application pool could cause this error. The application pool is no longer running because of configuration or reaching application failure limits. The concurrent application request limit was reached. #41771
  • Trying to access IWebHostEnvironment in a class library, referenced by my web project #41780
  • Kestrel network crash without any exceptions. #41792
  • RedisCache has no virtual methods? #41793

PullRequests

Created

  • Look at IIS functionals #41995
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Revert "Check the environment on Helix" #41977
    7.0-preview6
  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview6
  • Set Content-Type more accurately in SignalR TS client #41517
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 7.0-preview6
  • Mark changes in `.github` folder with `area-infrastructure` label #41981
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Allow returns from all single client proxies #41939
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • Implemented minimal WebTransport Middleware #41945
    area-runtime
  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime
  • Blazor Make Default Template Favicon Blazor Logo #41991
    area-mvc
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Backport 39275 to release/6.0 #41993
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0.x
  • Add RouteHandlerContext.Services property #41952
    area-runtime
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Revert "Skip failing template tests" #41950
    area-mvc
  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
    area-security
  • Remove unused directory in ANCM installers #41693
    feature-installers, servers-iis, area-runtime
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Backport Blazor boot config fix #41992

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ICommand is annoying... MAUI needs easy way to call a method like with UWP's "x:Bind" .. #7713
  • MAUI WebView doesn't allow to web session to inspected in Safari developer tools (Mac Catalyst) #7706
  • Setting FlyoutIsPresented="true" results in only the first two items being visible #7705
  • Layout incorrect using a horizontal linear layout inside a grid #7703
  • [Shapes] Path render wrong position #7700
  • WinUI: Pushing the same page instance onto a NavigationPage after popping it causes a crash. #7698
  • [MacCatalyst] Application crashes when it is signed with added Entitlements.plist #7693
    6.0-sr2
  • iOS: the Link metadata on automatically included items is incorrect #7692
  • [iOS]Wrong cursor position in Editor on ios and maccatalyst #7691
  • UWP: Command ChangeCanExecute does not re-enable a disabled button #7690
  • string assignment is everytime null #7688
  • [IOS] Launch performance #7687
  • Label is positioned incorrectly #7684
  • TypeConverter not respected when evaluating Binding #7683
  • [Android] Runtime Property Update is not working for InputTransparent #7682
  • [GridLayoutManager] if IGridLayout.Width/Height was valid, `ArrangeChildren` was not properly working #7681
  • Build and deploy for windows target in CLI #7678

Closed

  • Error NETSDK1147 workloads must be installed: maui-android #6077
    6.0-servicing
  • [Enhancement] Hit Testing service for element selection #1897
  • CollectionView scrolling doesn't work when inside stacklayout but works when inside a grid #7669
  • CollectionView is positioned incorrectly and the scrolling is broken #6784
    6.0-servicing
  • Maui Nightly builds #7653
  • [Android] CornerRadius ignores density #7130
    6.0-servicing
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Application.Current.Quit not working #7255
    6.0-sr1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix GridLayoutManager Layout calculation #7712
  • [build] Version .NET VS manifest file #7704
    area/setup 🪄, .NET 7
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 3.2.7 to 3.2.8 #7697

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr1
  • [iOS] Correctly return the value from Focus method #7694
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr1
  • [Android,iOS] Fix Selection on CollectionView and VSM color changes for Layouts #7689
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1

Merged

  • This is more correct #7685
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Propagate semantics to CV Item container #7539
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1
  • [Android] Fix Button CornerRadius issue #7215
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr1

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, 6.0-sr1

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0-sr1

Updated
